user_reviews.summary: Excellent location, rooms extremely clean and super comfy.
The room was plenty spacious for our family of four and pet friendly.
Manager Cammie went over the top with customer service & smile.

related_questions.question: How much to buy a Fairfield Inn?
related_questions.snippet: The cost of opening a Fairfield Inn by Marriott franchise can vary depending on a number of factors. On average, you can expect to invest between $12.02M-$33.83M. This range includes expenses like the initial franchise fee, equipment, signage, seating, and other essential costs.
related_questions.title: Fairfield Inn by Marriott Franchise Cost & Profit Exposed (2025 Update)

related_questions.question: What hotel owns Fairfield?
related_questions.snippet: Fairfield by Marriott is a franchised economy to midscale hotel brand of Marriott International. The properties target guests willing to accept fewer amenities for lower prices.
related_questions.title: Fairfield by Marriott

related_questions.question: When was Fairfield Hotel built?
related_questions.snippet: 1987. In 1987, Marriott opens its first Fairfield Inn in Atlanta, Georgia, referencing Fairfield Farm, a Marriott family property in rural northern Virginia. It is the company's first entry into the economy lodging segment.
related_questions.title: Our Story - Marriott
